scripts.dev:watch-env: npx nodemon --quiet --signal SIGTERM --watch shared/build-development-env --ignore './shared/build-development-env/dist/' --ignore './shared/build-development-env/esm/dist/' --ext .ts,.json,.sql,.mjs --exec 'yarn -s dev || exit 0'
scripts.dev: concurrently -r 'yarn -s dev:init' 'yarn -s build:shared:watch' 'wait-on shared/locales/esm/dist/index.d.ts && lerna run dev --stream --parallel'
scripts.test:playwright: yarn -s build:shared && cd backend/app/api && yarn build && cd ../../.. && cd tests/playwright && yarn -s test
scripts.build:shared:watch: npx nodemon --quiet --signal SIGTERM --watch shared --watch backend/shared --ignore './shared/*/dist/' --ignore './shared/*/esm/dist/' --ignore './backend/shared/*/dist/' --ext .ts,.json,.sql,.mjs --exec 'yarn -s build:shared || exit 0'
scripts.build:global:shared: echo '\033[35m[BUILD]\033[0m Building globally shared dependencies...' && cd shared/test-utils && yarn -s build && cd ../utility && yarn -s build && cd ../build-development-env && yarn -s build && cd ../structures && yarn -s build && cd ../object-differ && yarn -s build && cd ../excel-writer && yarn -s build && cd ../locales && yarn -s build && cd ../.. && echo '\033[35m[BUILD]\033[0m Done building globally shared dependencies.'
scripts.build:backend:shared: echo '\033[35m[BUILD]\033[0m Building shared backend dependencies...' && cd backend/shared/queues && yarn -s build && cd ../env && yarn -s build && cd ../i18n && yarn -s build && cd ../email && yarn -s build && cd ../sql && yarn -s build && cd ../models && yarn -s build && cd ../logging && yarn -s build && cd ../crons && yarn -s build && cd ../middleware && yarn -s build  && cd ../.. && echo '\033[35m[BUILD]\033[0m Done building backend shared dependencies.'
scripts.clear: bash -c 'shopt -s nullglob && rm -rf shared/*/dist shared/*/esm/dist frontend/app/*/dist backend/shared/*/dist backend/app/*/dist'
scripts.ship: node ./.development/increase-structures-version.js && yarn -s clear:shared && yarn -s build:shared && lerna version --exact --force-publish --yes --no-private && lerna publish from-git --yes --no-private --otp $(op item get NPM --otp || :)
scripts.ship:force: node ./.development/increase-structures-version.js --force && yarn -s clear:shared && yarn -s build:shared && lerna version --exact --force-publish --yes --no-private && lerna publish from-git --yes --no-private --otp $(op item get NPM --otp || :)
scripts.ship:fix: lerna publish from-git --yes --no-private --otp $(op item get NPM --otp || :)
scripts.translate:auto-translate: cd shared/locales && yarn -s build && cd ../.. && cd .development/i18n-uuid && yarn auto-translate
scripts.translate: cd shared/locales && yarn -s build && cd ../.. && cd .development/i18n-uuid && yarn start
scripts.frontend:types: wait-on shared/locales/esm/dist/index.d.ts && cd frontend/app/dashboard && yarn -s check-types
